apiDefinitions.description: 获取系统中所有用户的列表信息，支持分页和筛选。

codeSamples.php:
<?php

// HTTP 请求 (cURL)
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://yourdomain.com/api/user?page=1&size=10');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
    'Accept: application/json'
]);

$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

echo $response;
codeSamples.python:
import requests

# HTTP 请求
response = requests.get('https://yourdomain.com/api/user', {
    'page': 1,
    'size': 10
})
print(response.json())
codeSamples.curl:
# HTTP 请求
curl -X GET "https://yourdomain.com/api/user?page=1&size=10" \
  -H "Accept: application/json"

apiDefinitions.description: 在系统中创建一个新的用户账户。

codeSamples.php:
<?php

$data = [
    'name' => '李四',
    'age' => 28,
    'email' => 'lisi@example.com'
];

// HTTP 请求 (cURL)
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://yourdomain.com/api/user');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, json_encode($data));
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
    'Content-Type: application/json'
]);

$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

echo $response;
codeSamples.python:
import requests

data = {
    'name': '李四',
    'age': 28,
    'email': 'lisi@example.com'
}

response = requests.post('https://yourdomain.com/api/user', json=data)
print(response.json())
